name: Skate 3D Traffic Rush Adventure
description:
TRY OUR SKATE 3D TRAFFIC RUSH ADVENTURE GAME

----------------------
- How to Play -
----------------------
- Tilt your device to control your skate.
- Tap the screen to go in overdrive mode to go insanely fast.

--------------------
- The Game -
--------------------
- 4 different cool clothing to unlock.
- 10 different cars and truck to avoid.
- Endless runner game with intense action
- Random game play assure a new experience each time.

-------------------
- The Story -
-------------------
You need a new adrenaline rush, skating in the park has become boring. You feel the need to get on the road and travel as fast as you can ! Avoid cars and trucks and speed up as much as you can, taking the road will allow you to get your rush but at the same time you'll get everywhere you want a lot faster.

You'll still have to be careful not to get hit by any cars, but you're a master on a skate so no worries, you'll get fast where you wan't and have some fun waving through cars and truck on this sunny beautiful day !

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> SKATE 3D TRAFFIC RUSH ADVENTURE GAME

We've created those games for you. Please help us improve them!
Write us at: support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
